name: BARD CLERIC SHADOW DANCER DEX BASE
author: QuantumForce

posts.author: QuantumForce
posts.content: If it is possible: a bard with curse song and high perform, Harm from Cleric and the shadowdancer for dex with raiper. perhaps epic dodge can be thrown in. but just the thought of harming someone, curse song to finnish him off, epic dodge to avoid first hits and a raiper for those nice crit ranges, please if someone can lay out a build along these standards. 40th lvl please. i think it would be a sweet build if it can be done.
